bibl.title: The Eras of Diocletian and the Martyrs: Addenda & Corrigenda.
bibl.note: Addenda and corrigenda to: IIDEM, The Era of the Martyrs, Miscellanea Papyrologica in occasione del bicentenario dell'edizione della Charta Borgiana = Papyrologica Florentina. XIX, 2 (Firenze, 1990) pp. 375-408, 3 tabl. - Pp. 163-164: Addenda to the table of datings by the moon published by: Roger S. BAGNALL and Klaas A. WORP, Dating by the Moon in Nubian Inscriptions, ChrEg 61 (1986) No. 122, pp. 347-357 (table p. 351).
bibl.seg: MacCOULL Leslie S.B. and Klaas A. WORP, The Eras of Diocletian and the Martyrs: Addenda & Corrigenda.
